tool_description: An easy tool to test proxy whether it's online, anonymous, is it HTTP, HTTPS or both, to get proxy performance timings.
name: Proxy Checker
title: Proxy Checker

api_list.name: Retrieve Proxy Information
api_list.description: For retrieving a proxy test result, you should make a request to this endpoint.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: **User Request ID** - received from the response of sending a proxy for checking.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://proxy-checker.p.rapidapi.com/api/user-request-management/v1/user-request/6416ab3d3c01efbe45e97675"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "proxy-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://proxy-checker.p.rapidapi.com/api/user-request-management/v1/user-request/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "proxy-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
